    • rotateTile

      public Response rotateTile(@NotNull @NotNull Tile tile, int times)
      method to rotate a tile after players sends a RotateTileRequest message
      Parameters:
      tile - tile to rotate
      times - how many times to perform rotation
      Returns:
      a status (RotatedTileResponse) response

    • drawTile

      public Response drawTile(int id, boolean drawFromFlippedDeck, int flippedTileIndex)
      method to draw a tile (handling DrawTileRequest) either from the TileDeck or from the FlippedTileDeck
      Parameters:
      id - player that sent the request
      drawFromFlippedDeck - boolean to identify if player asked to choose a tile from the flipped deck
      flippedTileIndex - if players chose to draw from the flipped deck, the wanted tiles index
      Returns:
      a status (DrawTileResponse) response

    • drawFromTemp

      public Response drawFromTemp(@NotNull @NotNull Player player, int row, int col)
      method to handle a DrawTileFromTempRequest, sent when a player wants to take the tile on their temp zone
      Parameters:
      player - player that sent the request
      row - row of the selected cell
      col - column of the selected cell
      Returns:
      a status (DrawFromTempResponse) response

    • placeTile

      public boolean placeTile(@NotNull @NotNull Player player, int row, int col, Tile tile)
      method to handle a PlaceTileRequest, to place a tile on the ship
      Parameters:
      player - player that sent the request
      row - row of the selected cell
      col - row of the selected cell
      tile - tile to place
      Returns:
      true if placed, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      player - that sent the request
      rankingPosition - position he want to be placed in
      Returns:
      true if placed, false otherwise

    • autoPlaceRemainingRockets

      public void autoPlaceRemainingRockets()
      this method checks if every players has placed its rocket after his ship is ready, and if did not automatically gives him a position after time is over, randomly

      public void startHourglass(Runnable onHourglassFinished)
      method called when construction phase starts, or when hourglass gets flipped (in a level2 game), and it starts the hourglass thread
      Parameters:
      onHourglassFinished - callback thread to execute once hourglass finishes

      method to handle an hourglass flip request, and it starts the hourglass thread, if can
      Parameters:
      id - player that flipped the hourglass
      Returns:
      true if flipped, false otherwise

    • handleDrawCardDrawing

      public Card handleDrawCardDrawing(int playerId)
      This method pick a card from the stack and return the card correctly formatted.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the id of the player.
      Returns:
      the card that needs to be sent to the controller.

    • handleAbandonedShipEffect

      public boolean handleAbandonedShipEffect(Card card)
      Handles the effect of an abandoned ship card on the game model. This method applies the effect of the card on the current game state and determines if specific game-ending conditions are met for the involved player.
      Parameters:
      card - the card representing the abandoned ship effect to be applied.
      Returns:
      true if the card's effect is successfully applied, false otherwise.

    • handleAbandonedStationEffect

      public boolean handleAbandonedStationEffect(Card card)
      Handles the effect of an abandoned station card on the game model. This method applies the effect of the card on the current game state and checks for specific game-ending conditions for the involved player.
      Parameters:
      card - the card representing the abandoned station effect to be applied.
      Returns:
      true if the card's effect is successfully applied, false otherwise.

    • handleEpidemicEffect

      public boolean handleEpidemicEffect(Card card)
      Handles the effect of an epidemic card on the game model. This method applies the effect of the epidemic card on the current game state, potentially triggering specific game-ending conditions for the current player.
      Parameters:
      card - the card representing the epidemic effect to be applied
      Returns:
      true if the card's effect is successfully applied, false otherwise

    • handleMeteorShowerEffect

      public boolean handleMeteorShowerEffect(Card card)
      Handles the effect of a meteor shower card on the game model. This method applies the meteor shower card's effect to the current game state and checks for game-ending conditions related to the involved player, such as the absence of crew or critical components like the central cabin.
      Parameters:
      card - the meteor shower card that triggers the effect to be applied
      Returns:
      true if the card's effect is successfully applied, false otherwise

    • handleOpenSpaceEffect

      public void handleOpenSpaceEffect(Card card)
      Handles the effect of an open space card on the game model. This method applies the effect of the card to the current game state and evaluates the outcome for the player. If the effect indicates failure, it marks the player as having lost.
      Parameters:
      card - the card representing the open space effect to be applied

    • handlePirateEffect

      public boolean handlePirateEffect(Card card)
      Handles the pirate effect for a given card by applying its effect and updating the player's game state.
      Parameters:
      card - the card whose effect is to be applied
      Returns:
      true if the card's effect was successfully applied, false otherwise

    • handlePlanetsEffect

      public boolean handlePlanetsEffect(Card card)
      Processes the effect of a given card on the current state of a planetary system.
      Parameters:
      card - the card whose effect is to be applied
      Returns:
      true if the card's effect was successfully applied, false otherwise

    • handleSlaversEffect

      public boolean handleSlaversEffect(Card card)
      Handles the effects of the Slaver's card on the current player by applying the card's effect and controlling game state conditions such as crew depletion or game loss conditions.
      Parameters:
      card - the card whose effect is to be applied to the current player
      Returns:
      true if the effect was successfully applied, false otherwise

      public boolean handleSmugglersEffect(Card card)
      Handles the effect of a smuggler card and applies game logic based on its result.
      Parameters:
      card - the card whose effect is to be handled and applied to the current player
      Returns:
      true if the effect was successfully applied, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      card - the card on which the stellar space dust effect is to

    • handleWarZoneEffect

      public boolean handleWarZoneEffect(Card card)
      Handles the effects of a specific war zone card on the current game state, applying the card's effect and checking various game end conditions.
      Parameters:
      card - the card whose effect is to be applied
      Returns:
      true if the card effect was successfully applied, false otherwise

    • updateAbandonedShipDTO

      public void updateAbandonedShipDTO(Card card)
      Updates the AbandonedShipDTO by modifying its choice property to false and sets the next player's ID based on the given card.
      Parameters:
      card - The card object which is expected to be an instance of AbandonedShipCard containing the AbandonedShipDTO to be

    • updateAbandonedStationDTO

      public void updateAbandonedStationDTO(Card card)
      Updates the AbandonedStationDTO associated with the provided card. Sets the choice of the AbandonedStationDTO to false and updates the next player ID.
      Parameters:
      card - the card containing the AbandonedStationDTO to be updated

    • updateMeteorShowerDTO

      public void updateMeteorShowerDTO(Card card)
      Updates the meteor shower data transfer object (DTO) associated with the specified card. Increments the meteor number, sets a random direction number, and updates the coordinates to default values.
      Parameters:
      card - the card that contains the meteor shower DTO to be updated. Must be of type MeteorShowerCard.

    • updateOpenSpaceDTO

      public void updateOpenSpaceDTO(Card card)
      Updates the OpenSpaceDTO associated with the given card. This involves setting the next player ID and resetting the tiles with batteries.
      Parameters:
      card - the card containing the OpenSpaceDTO to be updated. Must be an instance of OpenSpaceCard.

    • updatePirateCardDTO_nextPlayer

      public void updatePirateCardDTO_nextPlayer(Card card)
      Updates the PirateCardDTO for the next player by resetting and assigning necessary values.
      Parameters:
      card - The card object, which must be an instance of PirateCard, to update its related PirateCardDTO properties for the next player's turn.

    • updatePirateCardDTO_samePlayer

      public void updatePirateCardDTO_samePlayer(Card card)
      Updates the PirateCardDTO properties for the same player. This method modifies the fire shot number, generates a new random fire shot direction number, and sets the using shield properties to default or specific values for the pirate card DTO.
      Parameters:
      card - the card object, which must be an instance of PirateCard, where its PirateCardDTO properties will be updated

    • updatePlanetsDTO

      public void updatePlanetsDTO(Card card)
      Updates the PlanetsDTO associated with the given card.
      Parameters:
      card - The card containing the PlanetsDTO that needs to be updated. Must be an instance of PlanetsCard.

    • updateSlaversDTO

      public void updateSlaversDTO(Card card)
      Updates the SlaversDTO by setting the next player ID and clearing tiles with battery usage.
      Parameters:
      card - the card containing the SlaversDTO and

    • updateSmugglersDTO

      public void updateSmugglersDTO(Card card)
      Updates the smugglers' DTO associated with the given card. This method modifies the state of the DTO by emptying its tiles with battery after setting the next player ID.
      Parameters:
      card - the card object associated with the current operation, expected to be an instance of SmugglersCard

    • updateStellarSpaceDustDTO

      public void updateStellarSpaceDustDTO(Card card)
      Updates the StellarSpaceDust Data Transfer Object (DTO) based on the given card.
      Parameters:
      card - the card object used to update the StellarSpaceDust DTO.

    • updateWarZoneDTO

      public void updateWarZoneDTO(Card card)
      Updates the WarZoneDTO of a given WarZoneCard. This method adjusts the penalty number, clears the list of selected tiles, and sets a random fire shot direction number if certain conditions are met.
      Parameters:
      card - the card object to be updated. It must be an instance of WarZoneCard.

    • getNextRankingPosition

      public int getNextRankingPosition(int currentPlayerId)

    • translateRankingPosition

      public int translateRankingPosition(int playerId)
      Translates the ranking position of a player to a zero-based index.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the unique identifier of the player whose ranking position is to be translated
      Returns:
      the zero-based index corresponding to the player's ranking position, or -1 if the position is not recognized

    • getFirstPlayerId

      public int getFirstPlayerId()
      Retrieves the ID of the first player based on their ranking position.
      Returns:
      the ID of the player with the first ranking position, or -1 if no such player exists.

    • calculateFirePower

      public double calculateFirePower(Card card)

    • calculateThrustPower

      public int calculateThrustPower(Card card)
      Calculates the total thrust power for the ship associated with the given card.
      Parameters:
      card - the card containing the necessary data to calculate thrust power, including the player's ship details and the war zone information
      Returns:
      the total thrust power for the player's ship based on its current layout, battery manager, and the tiles being used with the battery

      public Player getPlayerById(int id)

      public void fillTryLevelShip()

    • removePlayer
